Package com.brightcove.player.event

Interface EventListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
BackgroundEventListener, BaseVideoView.OnProgressListener, BrightcovePluginManager.OnRegisterPluginListener, MediaPlayerPlayback.OnSetSourceListener, MediaPlayerPlayback.OnWillChangeVideoListener, OmnitureComponent.OnActivityStoppedListener, OmnitureComponent.OnCollectLifeCycleDataListener, OmnitureComponent.OnDidSeekToListener, OmnitureComponent.OnDidSetVideoListener, OmnitureComponent.OnPauseCollectLifeCycleDataListener, OmnitureComponent.OnPauseListener, OmnitureComponent.OnPlayListener, OmnitureComponent.OnProgressListener, OmnitureComponent.OnSelectedSourceListener, OmnitureComponent.OnSetHeartbeatConfigDataListener, OmnitureComponent.OnVideoCompletedListener, SeekButtonController.HideSeekControlsHandler, SeekButtonController.SeekConfigurationHandler, SeekButtonController.SeekHandler, SeekButtonController.SeekOffsetHandler, SeekButtonController.ShowSeekControlsHandler, ShutterViewController.OnRegisterPluginListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnDidSeekToListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnDidSetSourceListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnPlayerReadyListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnPlayListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnRemoveCuePointListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnSeekToListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnSetCuePointListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnSetCuePointsListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnSetVideoListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnSourceSelectedListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnVideoCompletedListener, VideoPlaybackController.OnWillChangeVideoListener
public interface EventListener
Abstract class used as part of the event registration process. Components may create anonymous classes using this interface.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    processEvent(Event event)
    Process a given event to some purpose.

  • Method Details

    • processEvent

      void processEvent(Event event)
      Process a given event to some purpose. The event can contain or provide payload data via properties.
      Parameters:
      event - The given event.
